item.title: F1 Brazilian Grand Prix – Start time, starting grid, how to watch, & more
item.content:encoded:
巴西大奖赛周六的冲刺比赛中，卫冕世界冠军在第一弯超越了排位第一的兰多·诺里斯，成功获得了本赛季第四场冲刺比赛的胜利。诺里斯在开局后掉到第三位，但成功恢复并为麦克拉伦车队拿下亚军。红牛车队的塞尔吉奥·佩雷斯也在糟糕的开局后反弹，最终获得。。。 关键词：冲刺比赛、巴西大奖赛、卫冕世界冠军、兰多·诺里斯、亚军 总结：

冲刺比赛中，卫冕世界冠军在巴西大奖赛中表现出色，成功击败了兰多·诺里斯并一直保持领先，获得本赛季第四场冲刺比赛的胜利。尽管诺里斯在开局后掉到第三位，但他成功反弹并为麦克拉伦车队赢得亚军。同样，塞尔吉奥·佩雷斯也在糟糕的开局后展现出强劲的实力，最终获得...（未提及具体名次）。
The reigning world champion was victorious in the Brazilian GP sprint race on Saturday, beating polesitter Lando Norris into Turn 1 before managing from the front to pick up his fourth sprint race triumph of the season. Norris recovered from dropping to third on the opening lap to take the runner-up result for McLaren, as the other Red Bull of Sergio Perez also rallied from a poor start to finish ...Keep reading

item.title: Perez: F1 hasn't achieved aims with sprint format, backs idea of reversed grids
item.content:encoded:
Sao Paulo, race weekend, F1, sprint races, 2023 season, qualifying order, standalone day, reception, drivers

总结:
Sao Paulo举办的比赛周末结束了2023赛季F1大型静态比赛的举办，今年的比赛数量从三场增加到了六场。在这次改变中，静态比赛将不再对完整的大奖赛排位产生影响，周六将成为一个独立的比赛日，用于静态预选赛和比赛活动。然而，车手们对此的接受度仍然存在分歧。
The race weekend in Sao Paulo concluded F1's larger offering of sprint races over the 2023 season, having expanded from three to six for this year. This came amid a change where the sprint would no longer have an impact on the full grand prix's qualifying order, with Saturday acting as a standalone day for the sprint qualifying and race events.However, reception among the drivers remains ...Keep reading

item.title: Verstappen: New F1 pitlane impeding rules "absolutely terrible"
item.content:encoded:
drivers, pitlane, maximum lap time rule, traffic, Brazilian Grand Prix

总结：为了减少排位赛期间的交通拥堵，国际汽车联合会（FIA）禁止了车手在离开维修区的出口停车的行为，并在巴西大奖赛中引入了新的指导方针。根据新的规定，车手可以在离开维修区的出口和第二个安全车线之间保持距离，只要他们始终保持在最左边。这项规定旨在为车手在出发前安排足够的空间，同时保证交通畅通。
Following instances of drivers stopping on the exit of the pitlane in recent races, in response to a maximum lap time rule designed to minimise traffic during qualifying, the FIA elected to ban that practice and introduce new guidance for the Brazilian Grand Prix.This allows drivers to make their gap between the pit exit and the second safety car line, as long as they remain as far left as ...Keep reading

item.content:encoded:

总结: 汉密尔顿在排位赛中获得第五名，但在冲刺赛中掉到了第七名，输给了勒克莱尔和角田。他在24圈比赛中落后胜利者维斯塔潘34.7秒，并且在美国大奖赛上被取消资格之前追赶到第二名，此外在墨西哥也有过冲刺行驶到第二名的表现。

item.title: Ferrari drivers having to lift and coast at "every corner" in Brazil F1 sprint
item.content:encoded:
Max Verstappen, Lando Norris, Turn 1, Interlagos, temperatures, Charles Leclerc, Carlos Sainz 最终胜出者Max Verstappen在星期六的比赛中冲过了第一发车手Lando Norris，接着几乎整个车队都抱怨需要管理温度。尽管Charles Leclerc从第七位爬升到第五位，Ferrari车队队友Carlos Sainz也升至第八位，但是他们都受到必须减速的限制。Sainz... 总结：

- Max Verstappen在星期六的比赛中超过了Lando Norris开始了比赛。 - 几乎整个车队都抱怨温度管理的问题。 - Charles Leclerc从第七名爬升到第五名。 - Carlos Sainz也成功升至第八名。 - 比赛中Sainz被迫减速。
After eventual winner Max Verstappen dived past polesitter Lando Norris into Turn 1 of the 24-lap Saturday race at Interlagos, almost the entire field then complained of having to manage temperatures.While Charles Leclerc climbed from seventh to fifth place and Ferrari team-mate Carlos Sainz gained a spot to finish eighth, both were severely restricted by a need to jump off the throttle.Sainz ...Keep reading

item.title: Norris baffled by poor start that cost him lead in Brazil F1 sprint race
item.content:encoded:
Briton, getaway, front of the grid, speed, lead, second phase of acceleration, front-row starter, Verstappen, outdrag, McLaren, seize the lead, surge through, inside, Norris, safe. 总结：

在比赛开始时，英国车手在起跑位置表现出色，并拥有足够的速度来领先进入第一个弯道。然而，在加速的第二阶段，与其并排起跑的车手Verstappen通过内线超过了麦克拉伦车手，并夺得了领先位置。Norris承认，也许他在比赛中采取了过于保守的策略，但他并不确定为什么这样做…
The Briton had made an good getaway from the front of the grid and seemed to have the speed to lead into the first corner. However, during the second phase of acceleration, fellow front-row starter Verstappen was able to outdrag the McLaren and seized the lead after surging through on the inside. Norris admitted that perhaps he had played things too "safe", but he was not convinced about why ...Keep reading

Pérez, George Russell, Lewis Hamilton, Mercedes, Interlagos
乐手出现了很糟糕的开局，被两辆梅赛德斯超过。不过他很快就重新超过了两辆车，保持了第三的位置，直到比赛结束。总结：乐手在巴西站的比赛起初遇到了一些困难，但很快恢复并保持了第三位的好成绩。
Third-starting Perez had the worst start out of the frontrunners as he saw Mercedes' George Russell pull along the inside into Turn 1 at Interlagos.He was then also passed by the second Mercedes of Lewis Hamilton, who pulled off a late move around the outside into Turn 4.But Perez was soon able to pass both Mercedes cars to reclaim third by lap 10 of the 24-lap sprint, which he kept until the ...Keep reading

总结: 在2023年的巴西大奖赛中，维斯塔潘在首个弯道超越了诺里斯，并以超过4秒的领先优势赢得了赛季的最后一场冲刺比赛。诺里斯和乔治·拉塞尔在比赛初期交换了第二名的位置，这使得维斯塔潘能够拉开差距。第二辆红牛赛车由塞尔吉奥·佩雷斯超过了拉塞尔，最终在诺里斯之后获得第三名。

Verstappen grabbed a much stronger launch off the line when the lights went out, and took advantage of a passive Norris to thread his Red Bull down the inside.The threat of Norris subsided quickly when the McLaren was dispatched by George Russell at Turn 11, as the Mercedes pounced on a gap to move into second.But Russell could not get near Verstappen and the Dutchman was given the opportunity to ...Keep reading

丹尼尔·里卡多在墨西哥大奖赛中以惊人的排位赛第四名超过了塞尔吉奥·佩雷斯，这提高了他明年代表红牛车队取代佩雷斯的几率。这三个接下来的比赛对于这两位最受欢迎的车手来说至关重要。里卡多驾驶AlphaTauri超过了佩雷斯在墨西哥大奖赛上的表现，而AlphaTauri被认为是红牛车队的性能较低的姐妹车。

race, allegations, track limits, on-board footage, Circuit of the Americas

item.title: Alonso "in the wrong place, wrong moment" in scary Ocon F1 crash

The Aston Martin driver was unable to take part in the second part of the shootout that determines the grid for the shortened Saturday race after sustaining heavy damage to the front-left corner.As the Spaniard slowly proceeded through Turn 2, former Alpine team-mate Esteban Ocon was forced to correct a slide and the subsequent change of direction sent him careering into the Aston.While Alonso ...Keep reading

item.title: How tyre development improves a racing driver
item.content:encoded:
技术，赛车，工程，驾驶技巧，2011-2012 总结：通过理解赛车的工程原理，作者在赛车比赛中超越了比自己更有天赋的选手。作者认为理解赛车工程和驾驶技巧一样重要。他提到了2011-2012年是他赛车生涯中学到最多东西的年份。
I have always liked the technical aspects of racing and felt that understanding the engineering aspect would work in my favour. Sure enough, I managed to beat drivers who were probably more talented than me because I understood better how the car works. For me, this was always as important as the driving skills.Probably the years that I learned the most in my racing career were in 2011-12, when I ...Keep reading

Despite a first sector that was over two-tenths slower than the best efforts from the Red Bulls, Norris found time over the rest of the lap to clinch pole position for Saturday's shortened race - albeit with some evident bemusement after feeling that his lap was not particularly special.McLaren put both cars onto the track first in the SQ3 session, with Oscar Piastri opening the final stage with a ...Keep reading

item.title: Zakspeed founder Erich Zakowski passes away at age 89
item.content:encoded:
Zakspeed, touring cars, GTs, sportscars, disappointing 总结：Zakspeed是一支在房车、GT和跑车比赛中非常成功的车队，但在1985年至1989年的五年间参加的一级方程式赛车中表现欠佳，仅获得一次积分。Zakowski的家族在二战后从普鲁士迁移到了Nurburgring附近的小镇Niederzissen，他在那里接受了机械师的培训，并建立了自己的汽车修理厂和赛车团队。
Far more successful in touring cars, GTs and sportscars Zakspeed had a disappointing five-year spell in Grand Prix racing from 1985 to 1989, logging a single points finish.After WW2 Zakowski’s family moved from Prussia and eventually settled in the town of Niederzissen, not far from the Nurburgring, where he trained as a mechanic and set up his own garage and eventually racing team.From the ...Keep reading

item.title: F1 not alarmed about spiralling Las Vegas GP costs
item.content:encoded:
F1 owner Liberty, event, costs, construction period, rising CapEx costs 总结: 《F1老板利伯提》首次直接推广的活动，公司为购买比赛场地和创建永久建筑物承担了成本，这些成本在建设期间不断上升，同时与举办比赛相关的其他费用也不断增加。利伯提媒体首席财务官布赖恩提供了关于不断上升的资本支出成本的深入见解。
The event is the first promoted directly by F1 owner Liberty, and the company has borne the cost of buying the land for the pit and paddock area and creating the permanent buildings that are on it.The costs have risen over the construction period, while other expenses connected to putting on the race have also escalated.An insight into the rising CapEx costs was given by Liberty Media CFO Brian ...Keep reading

item.content:encoded:
pitlane, update package, Circuit of the Americas, Fernando Alonso, retire, floor damage, Mexican disappointment, pace, operational savvy, Interlagos, green cars 总结: 这篇文章主要介绍了车队在Circuit of the Americas比赛中尝试使用更新包，并且出现了三次从车队发车的情况，他们试图更多地了解这个更新包。不幸的是，Fernando Alonso在比赛中两次因地板损坏而被迫退赛。然而，就在墨西哥比赛失望之后的几天，车队在Interlagos展现出了速度和操作智慧。
Those events saw three out of four starts made from the pitlane as the team tried to learn more about the update package it debuted at Circuit of the Americas. And just to make life even tougher, Fernando Alonso was forced to retire from both races with floor damage.And yet, just days after the Mexican disappointment, the team showed both pace and operational savvy at Interlagos as the green cars ...Keep reading

item.title: F1 in talks to overhaul sprint format for 2024
item.content:encoded:
F1, format change, sprint weekends, separate qualifying session, interrupted flow. 总结：

F1今年改变了六个冲刺周末的赛制。与周日主要大奖赛的起跑顺序由冲刺赛决定的传统方式不同，冲刺赛现在在周六接受独立的排位赛。但是，由于主赛排位在周五和周六的冲刺日进行的更改，在周末的流程中产生了混乱。
F1 changed the format of its six sprint weekends for this year. Instead of the sprint race setting the grid for Sunday's main grand prix, the sprint received a separate qualifying session on Saturday, disconnecting it from the rest of the weekend.But with qualifying for the main race on Friday and Saturday being a standalone sprint day, the interrupted flow of the weekend has caused confusion ...Keep reading

item.title: F1 teams pushing to relax parc ferme rules but must limit engineer 'fantasies'
item.content:encoded:
Parc ferme, cost cap, curfews, FIA, money-saving measures. 总结: FIA在2021年引入了限制费用上限以及工作时间的规定，导致了的减少车队在比赛间调整车辆配置的限制。这一主题逐渐引起了关注，其目的是为了节省费用。随着费用上限和工作时间限制的出现，现在有可能放宽对车队的parc ferme规定。
Parc ferme was introduced to limit how much teams could alter their set-up between sessions to effectively deter bespoke cars for qualifying and the races as part of money-saving measures.But since the FIA introduced a cost cap for F1 in 2021 and with curfews limiting how late teams may work to refine their cars, there is now scope for parc ferme regulations to be eased.This topic has climbed up ...Keep reading

item.content:encoded:

item.title: Perez says he "should have been on the front row" in F1 Brazilian GP
item.content:encoded:
Verstappen, pole position, Interlagos, red-flagged, thunderstorm. Verstappen在下雨天和风况改变的情况下，以1分10.727秒的快速圈速，打破了费拉利对手Charles Leclerc的纪录，取得了位居Interlagos站的杆位。虽然在最后4分钟因雷暴天气停止比赛，但Q3赛段大部分时间的赛道状况仍然是干燥的。Verstappen表示，由于风况变化，赛道的抓地力大幅减少，使得他的圈速变得很糟糕。

item.title: F1 Brazilian GP sprint qualifying and race - Start time, how to watch & more
item.content:encoded:
F1, sprint race, Saturday, standalone event, sprint qualifying, starting grid, Max Verstappen, pole position, Charles Leclerc, Q3, red-flagged, heavy rain. 总结: F1将其冲刺赛变成了一个独立的周六赛事，其中冲刺排位赛决定了起跑阵容，后续进行冲刺赛。在周日大奖赛的排位赛中，马克斯·维斯塔潘在查尔斯·勒克莱尔克前夺得了杆位，因为Q3在大雨中被红旗暂停。红旗震撼了比赛形势...
F1 has turned its sprint race into a standalone Saturday event, with sprint qualifying deciding the starting grid followed by the sprint race later in the day. Here’s how the latest sprint race format changes will work.During qualifying for Sunday’s grand prix, Max Verstappen grabbed pole position ahead of Charles Leclerc as Q3 was red-flagged by heavy rain late on.The red flag has shaken up ...Keep reading

item.title: "Gutted" Norris says McLaren was quick enough for F1 Brazilian GP pole
item.content:encoded:
Briton, Q3 shootout, top grid spots, Q2 segment, Interlagos track, Norris, seventh, Max Verstappen, Charles 总结: 在最后的Q3排位赛中，英国车手表现强劲，在Q2排位赛中领先，但由于一场大风暴吹袭Interlagos赛道，车手们在Q3中遇到了困难，Norris未能重复之前的表现，最终排名第七。Max Verstappen获得头名，Charles紧随其后。
The Briton had looked strong heading into the final Q3 shootout for the top grid spots, after leading the way in the Q2 segment of qualifying for Sunday's race.But drivers endured a tricky time in setting their laps in Q3 as a major storm blew over the Interlagos track, and Norris failed to repeat his earlier form to end up seventh on the grid.Max Verstappen claimed the top spot ahead of Charles ...Keep reading

item.title: Leclerc nearly abandoned Q3 F1 lap due to unprecedented Brazil conditions
item.content:encoded:
倒计时、排位赛、延迟、风暴、Max Verstappen 倒计时结束后，排位赛因为清理赛道上的残留物而延迟了15分钟。这导致Q3在接近结束时遭遇了一场风暴，最终不得不取消。Max Verstappen在排位赛的早期阶段以1分10.727秒的飞速圈速获得了杆位。Red ...（文章未完成，无法得知后续内容）。

总结：排位赛因为赛道上的残留物延迟，导致风暴影响了最后的阶段。Max Verstappen在早期阶段取得了杆位。
A 15-minute delay to the start of qualifying, owed to clearing the track of debris, meant Q3 ran late. That allowed for a storm to arrive in the closing stages of the shootout.As a result, Q3 was ultimately red-flagged with four minutes to run when the thunder and lightning hit.Max Verstappen therefore bagged pole for the Sunday race with a 1min10.727s flying lap set early in the session. The Red ...Keep reading

item.title: 2023 Brazilian GP F1 qualifying results: Verstappen takes pole
item.content:encoded:
Verstappen, qualifying session, grid, sprint weekend format, Brazilian GP

总结: 在巴西大奖赛的冲刺周末赛制下，维斯塔潘在排位赛中获得领先位置，超过了勒克莱尔和斯托尔。这个一小时的排位赛被分为三个部分，前五名在Q1和Q2中被淘汰，然后进行排位赛的前10名角逐Q3。由于这是冲刺周末的赛制，这些会话设置了周日比赛的起跑顺序，对周六的冲刺比赛没有任何影响。
Verstappen will start ahead of Ferrari’s Charles Leclerc and Aston Martin’s Lance Stroll after the one-hour qualifying session, which is split into three segments with five cars each being knocked out in Q1 and Q2 before the top-10 shootout of Q3.As this is a sprint weekend format, these sessions set the grid for Sunday’s race and have no impact on Saturday’s sprint event.Brazilian GP ...Keep reading

The Sao Paulo skyline became increasingly heavy as dark clouds drew over the Interlagos circuit, prompting an early queue for laps as rain looked to be imminent in the opening phase of the session.When it emerged, the circuit descended into darkness to prompt the throwing of a red flag, as the rain finally came once the opening laps had been concluded.Verstappen ensured he was at the front of the ...Keep reading

item.title: Wolff: Elliott departure has "no correlation" with Mercedes F1 performance
item.content:encoded:
Elliott, Mercedes, CTO, stepping down, world championships. 总结: 本文报道了梅赛德斯车队的首席技术官埃利奥特将辞去他的职位的消息。他在梅赛德斯车队的职业生涯中扮演着重要的角色，尤其在F1涡轮混合动力时代的世界锦标赛中。该决定是他个人做出的，并且它将产生重大影响。
Earlier this week Mercedes announced Elliott would be stepping down from his CTO role, seven months after swapping positions with technical director James Allison.Elliott, who originally joined the squad in 2012 as head of aerodynamics, was hailed for his instrumental role in Mercedes' unprecedented streak of world championships in F1's turbo hybrid era.He said the decision was his, and it would ...Keep reading

United States GP, excluded, results, plank, worn

总结: 意大利车队和梅赛德斯车队在美国大奖赛中被取消成绩，因为查尔斯·勒克莱尔克（Charles Leclerc）的车辆上的挡板磨损超过了规定。勒克莱尔克失去了第六名的成绩，而刘易斯·汉密尔顿（Lewis Hamilton）在冠军马克斯·维斯塔潘（Max Verstappen）之后的亚军位置也被取消。法拉利和梅赛德斯都承认他们只是在规则上犯了错误。
The Italian squad joined Mercedes in being excluded from the results of the United States GP, after the plank on Charles Leclerc’s car was found to have worn more than the regulations allowed.Leclerc lost his sixth placed finish, while Lewis Hamilton was excluded from his runner-up slot behind race-winner Max Verstappen.Both Ferrari and Mercedes admitted they had simply made a mistake with their ...Keep reading

Lewis Hamilton and Fernando Alonso sustained left-rear punctures during FP1 at Interlagos.Any time lost is particularly critical during a sprint race weekend where there is only one hour-long practice session before parc ferme and qualifying.Autosport observed on Thursday night that mud had dried in the grooves cut into the track surface. These are designed to carry rainwater off the track to ...Keep reading

item.title: FIA’s new pitlane impeding stance won’t work, warns Magnussen
item.content:encoded:
巴西大奖赛筹备过程中，F1赛事总监尼尔斯·维蒂希宣布了关于车手在排位赛中试图拉大与前方车辆的间隔的立场变化。在此前的一系列事件中，一些车手会在终点处停下来，以便在开始他们的快圈时获得足够的空间，这样会导致后方车辆堆积。此类行为现在已被禁止。对于所有双方... 总结：

总结：F1赛事总监宣布禁止车手在排位赛中试图在终点处建立与前方车辆的间隔的行为。这一变化是为了避免车手在赛道入口排队拉大间隔，给后方车辆带来不利影响。
Ahead of the Brazilian Grand Prix, F1 race director Niels Wittich announced a change of stance regarding drivers trying to build-up gaps ahead of them in the pitlane in qualifying.Following a spate of incidents where drivers have stopped at the end of the pitlane to help them get space ahead of them for their outlap, stacking up rivals behind them, such behaviour has now been outlawed.For both ...Keep reading

item.title: Tsunoda explains why Ricciardo is more heavily linked with Red Bull F1 switch
item.content:encoded:
Perez, Red Bull, 2024, uncertain future, poor form
在墨西哥大奖赛之后，Perez与Red Bull的合同将持续到2024年，但由于他持续下滑的表现和车队在赛季中更换车手的记录，他的未来仍然存在很多不确定性。在比赛中，Perez在第一弯与勒克莱尔发生碰撞，导致他退赛，而Ricciardo则在排位赛中表现出色，取得了第四名。无法确定的未来和低迷的表现使Perez面临着压力。

总结: Perez在与勒克莱尔的碰撞导致退赛后，他在F1的未来变得不确定。他的表现下滑以及Red Bull在赛季中进行车手更换的记录使他的未来充满了不确定性。
Perez has a contract with Red Bull for 2024 but amid his protracted run of poor form and the team’s track record for mid-season driver changes, there remains plenty of uncertainty over his F1 future.This peaked following the Mexican Grand Prix last weekend. Fifth-starting Perez tangled with Charles Leclerc into Turn 1 to trigger his retirement, while Ricciardo excelled by qualifying fourth and ...Keep reading

item.title: F1 revenues up by 24% on 2022 in third quarter
item.content:encoded:
运营收益增长61%，从上个赛季的8200万美元增至今年同期的1.32亿美元。 10支F1车队在本季度共分享了4.32亿美元的付款，比2022年的3.7亿美元增加。然而，由于比赛安排的不同，很难进行直接的跨赛季比较。去年在7月至9月期间只有七个在欧洲举行的比赛。
Meanwhile, operating income was up by 61% from $82m last season to $132m for the same period this year.The 10 F1 teams shared payments of $432m between them during the quarter, up from $370m in 2022.However, direct comparisons across the seasons are difficult to make because of the different arrangements of races. Last year there were seven events in the July-September period, all in Europe.This ...Keep reading

item.title: Brazilian Grand Prix signs F1 contract to 2030
item.content:encoded:
Sao Paulo GP, Autodromo Jose Carlos Pace, hosting fee, 1990, 2020. 总结:

1990年，巴西大奖赛从里约热内卢城市转到Autodromo Jose Carlos Pace赛道，并于2020年与F1达成了续约，将比赛的举办权延长了五年。之前，赛道并不需要支付举办费用，但是新合约要求每年支付270万英镑的费用。因此，比赛被更名为Sao Paulo GP，以反映所在的城市。
The championship returned to the Autodromo Jose Carlos Pace in 1990, after a switch to Rio de Janeiro 12 years previously, and in 2020 event officials renewed terms with F1 for another five years.Previously, the venue did not pay a hosting fee. But that revised deal until 2025 came at a cost of £2.7million per year. As such, the event was renamed as the Sao Paulo GP to reflect the city’s ...Keep reading

Below is an overview of all current Formula 1 grand prix deal and the duration of the contracts as of October 2023.Japanese Grand Prix - Suzuka: 2024The Suzuka circuit has been on the Formula 1 calendar since 1987, with a two-year hiatus in 2007 and 2008. Last year the race extended its contract by three seasons until the end of 2024. Given the importance of the Japanese market and the challenging ...Keep reading

item.title: Verstappen: Las Vegas F1 race "more for the show than the racing itself"
item.content:encoded:
F1, Las Vegas race, permission, iconic Strip, $240 million.

总结: F1竭尽全力复兴Las Vegas赛事，获得了在赌场天堂的标志性大道上进行比赛的许可，并承担起了比赛本身的推广任务。F1在一块价值2.4亿美元的土地上进行了规模空前的建设，包括永久性的赛道控制大楼、维修区设施等。但实际的街道赛道本身是未知数。
F1 has gone to great lengths to revive the Las Vegas race, acquiring permission to race on the gambling haven's iconic Strip and taking on the promotion of the race itself, which takes place on 18 November.It has spent $240 million on a plot of land, where it has erected a permanent pit and race control building and paddock facilities, which is unprecedented.But the actual street circuit itself is ...Keep reading

item.title: Perez “sure” he’ll have support from Verstappen in F1 runner-up battle
item.content:encoded:
红牛队，维斯塔潘，佩雷兹，排位赛事故，积分争夺 总结：

去年，在巴西的因特拉戈斯赛道上，红牛车队发生了一场内讧，维斯塔潘拒绝放佩雷兹过去以获取额外积分。后来揭示出，维斯塔潘认为这是对佩雷兹几个月前在摩纳哥排位赛事故的回应，因为那次事故阻止了维斯塔潘争夺杆位的机会。目前，佩雷兹在积分榜上以20分的优势排名第二，领先刘易斯·汉密尔顿，还有三场比赛。
Last year in a similar situation at Interlagos, a civil war broke out in the Red Bull camp after Verstappen refused to let Perez by to score extra points.It later emerged that it was seen by Verstappen as payback after Perez’s qualifying crash in Monaco several months earlier had stopped the Dutchman’s shot at pole.Perez is currently lying second 20 points ahead of Lewis Hamilton with three ...Keep reading

item.title: F1 drivers warn against risk of Austin plank trouble repeat in Brazil
item.content:encoded:
Interlagos, sprint event, 2023 season, parc ferme conditions, Charles Leclerc, Lewis 总结: - Interlagos是2023赛季的第六场也是最后一场冲刺赛。 - 冲刺赛的格式在今年早些时候给车队带来了一些麻烦，因为车辆在周五的自由练习后会被置于parc ferme条件下，意味着一些关键部件如悬挂高度将在周末的比赛中被锁定。 - 在上一场在奥斯汀的冲刺赛中，Charles Leclerc的法拉利和Lewis...

总结：2023赛季的最后一场冲刺赛将在Interlagos举行。冲刺赛的格式使得车队在本年度早些时候遇到了一些问题，因为在周五的自由练习后，车辆会被放置在固定的parc ferme条件下，这意味着一些关键的部件如悬挂高度将在整个周末的比赛中保持不变。在最近一场在奥斯汀的冲刺赛中，Charles Leclerc的法拉利和Lewis...
The race at Interlagos is the sixth and final sprint event of the 2023 season. The sprint format caused teams some headaches earlier this year because cars are put under parc ferme conditions after Friday's single free practice session, meaning key items such as ride heights are locked in for the remainder of the weekend.At the last sprint event in Austin Charles Leclerc's Ferrari and Lewis ...Keep reading

item.title: Aston Martin set to mix and match F1 upgrades for Brazil GP
item.content:encoded:
Spaniard, Lance Stroll, difficult run of races, balance of the car, brake problems
西班牙车手Spaniard和队友Lance Stroll在一系列艰难的比赛中遇到了困难，二人都对车辆的平衡感到不满意。不仅如此，车队在美国大奖赛期间的赛道FP1中也遇到了刹车问题，最终导致了整个周末的失败。然而，在即将到来的冲刺赛中，他们希望能够克服这些问题，重新找回状态。总结：Spaniard和Lance Stroll在最近的比赛中遇到了困难，包括车辆平衡问题和刹车故障，但他们希望在即将到来的比赛中能够解决这些问题。
The Spaniard and team-mate Lance Stroll have endured a difficult run of races since new developments arrived at the United States Grand Prix.Neither driver has been particularly happy with the balance of the car, and things were not helped by the team getting struck by brake problems in FP1 at Austin’s Circuit of the Americas that ultimately derailed its weekend there.But ahead of a sprint race ...Keep reading

The German manufacturer is undergoing an encouraging spell of form thanks to a floor upgrade that has helped Lewis Hamilton finish runner-up at the last two races, although he was subsequently disqualified from the United States GP.That form bears some similarities to last year, though, when Mercedes enjoyed some strong promise in these same races – which included victory for Russell in the ...Keep reading

item.title: Haas should have heeded burned-out Mexico F1 brake sensor warning
item.content:encoded:
Magnussen, brake temperatures, sensors burned out, defending, rear temperatures, suspension overheated. 总结: 文章介绍了在一场比赛中，Magnussen因为进行激烈的防守而导致刹车温度升高，刹车传感器烧坏并停止向车队墙传递信息。这一问题最终导致后悬挂过热。车队经理表示将在以后更加谨慎地处理刹车温度的问题。
The team boss said they will "be more careful" with rising brake temperatures after Magnussen’s sensors burned out and stopped relaying information to the pitwall.As previously revealed, the brake temperatures rose because Magnussen was defending hard from Logan Sargeant, and had wound the bias to the rear.That eventually tipped rear temperatures over the edge, which overheated the suspension ...Keep reading

item.title: F1 drivers banned from stopping in pitlane amid FIA impeding clampdown
item.content:encoded:
FIA, 最大圈速限制, 危险交通问题, 准备圈, 清晰空隙, 工程空气, 技术罚款, 总结： FIA近期针对排位赛中出现的危险交通问题采取了限制进出圈的最大时间的措施。然而，这导致了一个意想不到的后果，即驾驶员在开始准备圈时无法找到理想的空隙。因此，他们尝试在维修站内争取清晰的空气。已经出现了几起驾驶员试图利用这种方式的情况。这个问题已经引起了人们的关注，并可能导致对违规行为的技术罚款。总结：FIA为了解决排位赛中的危险交通问题实施了最大圈速限制，但这却引发了驾驶员在准备圈时无法找到空隙的问题。驾驶员尝试在维修站内争取清晰的空气。此问题已引起关注，可能会有技术罚款。
A recent move by the FIA to avoid dangerous traffic problems on track in qualifying has seen a maximum lap time imposed on in laps and out laps.This has, however, triggered an unintended consequence of drivers being unable to find clear gaps behind rivals once they begin their preparation laps, so they try to engineer this clear air in the pitlane.There have been several occasions where drivers ...Keep reading

item.title: Sainz: Current F1 sprint format "too revealing" of full grand prix events

本文介绍了2023赛季的第六场和最后一场冲刺赛将在圣保罗大奖赛周末举行，并且已经成为自从F1开始尝试引入缩短比赛以来，唯一一个在所有三个赛季都举办过冲刺赛的赛道。冲刺赛曾用作定下完整大奖赛的出发阵容的方法，在2021和2022年使用，但2023年的改革实际上创造了...
The sixth and final sprint race of the 2023 season will take place over the Sao Paulo Grand Prix weekend, as Interlagos becomes the only circuit to have hosted sprints in all three seasons since F1 began to experiment with introducing shortened races.Sprint races were used as a method of setting the grid during 2021 and 2022 for the full grands prix, but 2023's reformat has effectively created a ...Keep reading

After several side-by-side battles, Tsunoda attempted to finally pass the McLaren rookie for seventh place on lap 49 of 71 with the aid of DRS into Turn 1.But as he moved around the outside, his right-rear wheel tagged Piastri’s front left to trigger a spin. He re-joined the track in 16th and finished 12th.Although Tsunoda defended his attempted overtake on Piastri, he has now revealed that his ...Keep reading

Ricciardo's progress was halted by the hand injury that he received at his third appearance in Zandvoort, which cost him five races.However, in Mexico he stunned the F1 paddock by qualifying fourth and hanging on to a valuable seventh place in the race.Tost, who steps back into an advisory role at the end of the season, says he knew that Ricciardo – who drove for the team in its Toro Rosso guise ...Keep reading

Alonso, Red Bull, retirement, social media rumors, Albert Fabrega's tweet

总结: 最近社交媒体上充斥着有关阿隆索要么转投红牛车队，要么即将退役的报道。这是由于西班牙电视记者阿尔伯特·法布雷加发布了一条含糊其辞的推文，暗示在车队中有一项重大消息即将发生。虽然法布雷加没有具体指明这个谣言是关于什么话题的，但却引发了关于车手市场出现大动荡的疯狂猜测。
Social media was awash with stories in recent days about Alonso either switching to Red Bull or being poised for retirement. This was triggered by Spanish TV journalist Albert Fabrega posting a cryptic tweet hinting at a big story developing in the paddock.While Fabrega never specified what topic the rumour was about, it unleashed a frenzy that it was about a big shake-up in the driver market ...Keep reading

item.title: Andretti: F1 teams think "we are a bunch of hillbillies"
item.content:encoded:
Andretti F1 team, approval, FIA, commercial terms, FOM, extra team, competitors, lukewarm, grid 总结: Andretti F1队希望在最早的2025年进入F1赛车赛场，并已获得国际汽车联合会(FIA)的批准。然而，要获得F1的参赛资格，Andretti需要与FOM商定商业条款，这并不是确定的事情，因为该系列赛的负责人对于赛道上增加一支新的车队并不热衷。与当前的竞争对手明显反对有关。
The American is hoping to get his Andretti F1 team onto the grid in 2025 at the earliest, having been given approval for an entry by the FIA.However, to be granted a place in F1, Andretti needs to agree commercial terms with FOM – something that is far from guaranteed as the series' chiefs are lukewarm about having an extra team on the grid.With F1's current competitors clearly against having ...Keep reading

item.title: Horner: We've not seen "full impact" of Red Bull's F1 cost cap penalty yet
item.content:encoded:
Triple world champion, Max Verstappen, Red Bull, RB19 车, 违反成本上限规则

总结:Max Verstappen以16次赛季胜利成为三届世界冠军，同时红牛车队的RB19赛车继续创造纪录。墨西哥的比赛周标志着红牛车队违反2021年成本上限规则一年，导致其受到罚款，并在风洞和CFD（计算流体力学）开发方面受到限制。同时，对于F1最大的逃亡大师，竞争对手是否有希望？这一惩罚使得竞争对手是否有希望逃脱红牛车队的追赶变得更加关键。
Triple world champion Max Verstappen took his 16th win of the season as Red Bull continues to rewrite the record books with its outstanding RB19 car.The Mexico weekend marked one year since Red Bull was found in breach of the 2021 cost cap rules, which landed it a fine and a reduction on wind tunnel and CFD development.PLUS: Do rivals have hope against F1’s greatest escape artists?That penalty ...Keep reading

Jerry Bruckheimer、Joseph Kosinski、F1 drivers、United States Grand Prix、Screen Actors Guild strike、pay、protection against Artificial Intelligence、F1 movie crew、revisit 总结: Jerry Bruckheimer和Joseph Kosinski在2023年美国大奖赛中与F1车手和车队负责人进行了会谈，更新了他们关于电影项目的情况。由于演员工会关于薪资和对抗人工智能的保护的罢工已经超过了100天，成为历史上最长的演员罢工，F1电影剧组将进行更多的访问。

item.title: What Mexico's "Racepect" campaign says about F1's toxicity problem
item.content:encoded:
墨西哥城推广者，被社交媒体和社会整体毒性极化所助长的全球体育赛事中的反社会行为所震惊。他们发起了一个名为“Racepect”的宣传活动，鼓励球迷将争斗留给赛道上的20位F1车手，而不是让其波及到看台上或在线平台上。比赛的努力在减少观众间的冲突和促进积极互动方面取得了成效。 关键词：墨西哥城推广者，反社会行为，Racepect，F1车手，观众冲突 总结： 墨西哥城的推广者们策划了一场名为“Racepect”的宣传活动，旨在引起人们的关注，并且鼓励球迷们将冲突留给赛道上的车手们。他们对全球体育赛事中不断增加的反社会行为感到担忧，这些行为得到社交媒体和整体社会的支持。墨西哥城推广者希望通过这项活动来减少冲突，并且鼓励积极的互动。他们认为，观众应该以积极的态度支持运动员，而不是从赛场延伸到看台或在线平台上产生冲突。该活动已取得了一定的成果，成功地减少了观众间的冲突，并且促进了积极的互动。
The Mexico City promoters were alarmed by antisocial behaviour at sporting events around the world, fueled by the toxic polarisation of social media and society as a whole.They launched an awareness-raising campaign called "Racepect", encouraging fans to leave the fighting to the 20 F1 drivers on the track rather than let it spill over into the grandstands or on online platforms.The race's efforts ...Keep reading

item.title: How F1’s top teams adapted their cars to Mexico’s unique demands
item.content:encoded:
关键词: 2285m，罕见开放车身，红牛，墨西哥，附加透气板 总结: 2285米海拔对汽车的空气动力学、散热需求和动力单元性能构成了重大挑战。即使拥有罕见开放车身的红牛车队也在墨西哥采取了谨慎的态度。他们在右侧顶部增加了一个附加的透气板，以保证性能和安全。在墨西哥赛道，由于罕见的高海拔，车队需要经过特殊的适应和调整，以保持最佳状态。总的来说，墨西哥赛车对车辆而言是一次重大挑战。
At 2285m above sea-level, the rarified air creates a significant challenge in respect of the car’s aerodynamics, cooling requirements and the performance envelope of the power unit.Even Red Bull, which has rarely had to sacrifice aerodynamic performance by opening up its bodywork as much as rivals, erred on the side of caution in Mexico. It fitted an additional louvred panel atop the right-hand ...Keep reading

总结:扎克·奥沙利文将在FP1中驾驶FW45，而弗朗哥·科拉平托将在接下来的年轻车手测试中与他的同伴F3毕业生共享驾驶职责。弗兰克·威廉姆斯爵士一直对新秀有着特殊的感情。我们可以看到，与威廉姆斯车队一同首次亮相的车手包括大卫·库尔萨德、雅克·维伦纳夫、詹森·巴顿、胡安·巴博罗·蒙托亚和尼科·罗斯伯格。

Just consider that the list of those who made their F1 race debuts with the team includes David Coulthard, Jacques Villeneuve, Jenson Button, Juan Pablo Montoya, Nico Rosberg ...Keep reading

item.title: Why you can forget the Alonso to Red Bull F1 rumours
item.content:encoded:
Mexico City, Perez, contract, performance, clash

总结: 在墨西哥城比赛中，Perez面临着家乡比赛的疯狂氛围和关于他合同的持续猜测，他知道一个出色的表现将有助于消除对他未来的疑虑，并证明他在奥斯汀的表现的好转是真实的。然而，在第一弯，他的赢或赔的态度对他产生了反效果，与勒克莱尔发生碰撞，被弹射到了逃生道上，并且受到了太多的损伤。
Amid the frenzy of Perez's home race, and constant speculation about his contract, the 33-year-old knew that a good performance at Mexico City would help silent doubts about his future and prove that hints of a turnaround in form from Austin were real. But a win-or-bust attitude at Turn 1 backfired as he clashed with Charles Leclerc, was launched down the escape road, and suffered too much damage ...Keep reading

路易斯·汉密尔顿连续第二场比赛以车手身份屈居麦克斯·维斯塔潘之后，并因在美国大奖赛中车顶覆板磨损过度而被取消资格。上周在墨西哥城，他从起跑六位升至以14秒之差追随红牛车队获胜。与此同时，他的队友乔治·罗素上升两位，最终位列第六。纵观整个报道... 关键词：路易斯·汉密尔顿、麦克斯·维斯塔潘、美国大奖赛、墨西哥城、车队乔治·罗素 总结：

The 2021 F3 runner-up stunned in his rookie F2 season ...Keep reading

item.title: Massa likely to skip visit to Brazilian GP amid F1 legal challenge
item.content:encoded:
巴西车手 诉诸律师评估对 2008 年世界锦标赛失利的阴谋的诉讼可能性。他认为当时国际汽联和一级方程式管理机构在了解到纳尔逊·皮奎特故意在 2008 年新加坡大奖赛中发生碰撞时，没有适当地采取行动，而这次意外事故证明对比赛产生了影响。 关键词: 巴西车手，律师，法庭行动，阴谋，失利 总结: 巴西车手认为国际汽联和一级方程式管理机构在2008年新加坡大奖赛中对纳尔逊·皮奎特的故意碰撞不当行动，他已聘请律师评估可能的诉讼行动，以揭示这一阴谋，因为这次碰撞对他输掉2008年世界锦标赛产生了重大影响。
The Brazilian has brought in lawyers to evaluate court action over what he feels was a conspiracy that resulted in him losing the 2008 world championship to Lewis Hamilton. He believes that at the time, the FIA and FOM (Formula One Management) did not act properly on the knowledge they had about Nelson Piquet’s deliberate crash at the 2008 Singapore GP, which proved to have an influential ...Keep reading

item.title: How AlphaTauri can cater to Ricciardo's F1 needs the way McLaren couldn’t
item.content:encoded:
Ricciardo McLaren 慢速问题 特点 确认 解决 方式 克里茨 舍弃换向 爆力

总结: 这篇文章主要讨论了Ricciardo和McLaren在两个赛季中努力让澳大利亚人适应Woking车队的设备。McLaren车队目前的车型在低速方面存在明显的弱点，这一问题仍未能得到解决，车手们不得不在制动和转弯风格上做出妥协。尽管Lando Norris和Oscar Piastri也在努力适应，但克里茨依然面临着挑战。-
For two seasons Ricciardo and McLaren tirelessly worked to make the Australian comfortable in the Woking squad's machinery.McLaren's current lineage of cars has a notorious low-speed weakness, which the team still hasn't been able to address, and its drivers have been forced to compromise their braking and cornering style more than they would like.While Lando Norris, and now Oscar Piastri, have ...Keep reading

item.title: Mercedes chief technical officer Mike Elliott departs F1 team
item.content:encoded:
Elliott, joined squad in 2012/head of aerodynamics/McLaren and Renault/Lotus/instrumental part in Mercedes F1 success/contract coming to an end this year/stepped away from technical director role/job swap with James 总结: Elliott于2012年加入团队，担任空气动力学负责人，在此之前曾在麦克拉伦和雷诺/罗塔斯效力。他在梅赛德斯F1车队的涡轮混合动力时代取得了巨大的成功，发挥了重要的作用。然而，随着他的合同于今年年底到期，并且他在今年早些时候辞去了技术总监职务，与詹姆斯进行了职位调换。
Elliott, who originally joined the squad in 2012 as head of aerodynamics after spells with McLaren and Renault/Lotus, has played an instrumental part in the success that Mercedes has enjoyed in F1 during the turbo hybrid era.But with his current contract coming to an end later this year, and him having stepped away from the technical director role earlier this year in a job swap with James ...Keep reading

item.title: The "jigsaw" McLaren is solving after shining on its weaker F1 circuits
item.content:encoded:
McLaren, triple-header, races, weakness, podium

麦克拉伦车队原本对接连进行的三场比赛感到担忧，这三个赛道都不利于他们的低速性能，无法发挥他们的高压力力量。然而，车队的悲观情绪被事实证明是错误的，他们在美国大奖赛中再次获得领奖台，洛朗多·诺里斯在墨西哥大奖赛中以惊人的表现，从第17位升至第5位。麦克拉伦在这一连串比赛中发挥出色，完全颠覆了他们对自己的不利预期。总结：麦克拉伦车队在三连胜中的表现给予了他们很大的鼓舞，展示了他们的实力和适应能力。
McLaren was braced for a difficult triple-header with races in Texas, Mexico and Brazil on three circuits that it feared would expose its slow-speed weakness and not cater to its high-downforce prowess.But the team's genuine pessimism proved unfounded as it scored another podium with Lando Norris at the US Grand Prix, and the Briton produced a stellar drive to move up from 17th to fifth in Mexico ...Keep reading

item.title: How Aston Martin's F1 season has gone off track
item.content:encoded:
摘要：两场比赛中，至少一辆车从维修区起跑，车队试图对当前的问题进行更多了解。而在连续两场比赛中，由于无法控制的底盘损坏，费尔南多·阿隆索退赛。同时，在几乎每个场地，兰斯·斯托尔都因为各种问题而失去了宝贵的赛前练习时间。他的持续霉运是... 关键词：比赛，车队，问题，底盘损坏，训练时间 总结： 在这篇文章中，围绕着三位车手的比赛经历，我们可以看到车队和车手遇到了诸多问题。车队为了解决当前的问题，在两场连续的比赛中有车辆从维修区起跑，并且费尔南多·阿隆索由于无法控制的底盘损坏而退赛。与此同时，兰斯·斯托尔在几乎每个场地都遇到了各种问题，失去了宝贵的赛前练习时间。这些不幸的事件给车队和车手带来了困扰，他们需要克服这些问题，以提高比赛表现。
In two consecutive races at least one car has started from the pitlane as the team has attempted to learn more about its current problems. And in two consecutive races, Fernando Alonso has retired due to floor damage that was outside his control.Meanwhile, at almost every venue Lance Stroll has lost priceless track time in practice to gremlins of one sort or another.His ongoing bad luck was ...Keep reading

item.title: Why Russell’s F1 Mexico GP charge fell apart
item.content:encoded:
Austin, Mercedes driver, fuel management, pace, Mexico, brake temperatures, Carlos Sainz, tyre performance, finish sixth, lost to Lando Norris 总结: 在奥斯汀，梅赛德斯车手为了节省燃料而不得不减速，而在墨西哥，他不得不做同样的事情来控制不断上升的刹车温度，他花了很多圈时间试图超越卡洛斯·塞恩斯。但无论在哪种情况下，当他能够再次加速时，轮胎都不会回应。在墨西哥，他以第六名的名次完赛，在最后几圈中败给了兰多·诺里斯，但他勉强控制住了...
In Austin the Mercedes driver had to check his pace to save fuel, and in Mexico he had to do the same to control spiralling brake temperatures, having spent many laps trying to find a way past Carlos Sainz.On both occasions when he was able to push harder once again his tyres wouldn’t respond.In Mexico he finished sixth, having lost out to Lando Norris in the closing laps, while just managing to ...Keep reading

item.title: Piastri's F1 Mexico GP compromised by damage from Tsunoda clash
item.content:encoded: Piastri made contact with Yuki Tsunoda twice during a fraught battle in the second part of the race.On the second clash the AlphaTauri driver was pitched off the road when he tried to pass on the outside at Turn 1. The FIA investigated the incident, but ultimately took no further action.A few laps later Piastri was asked to let Norris by so that the British driver could attack the cars ahead in ...Keep reading

item.title: Williams explains wild F1 Mexico GP form fluctuations
item.content:encoded: The Thai-Brit kicked off the event by running second fastest in first practice, lapping only 0.095 seconds shy of pacesetter and eventual race winner Max Verstappen. He then classified only 14th in FP2.In final practice on Saturday morning, Albon again troubled the lead Red Bull. He was 0.07s adrift of Verstappen to finish second, but again fell back to 14th in qualifying before racing to two ...Keep reading

item.title: Horner: "Outstanding" Ricciardo looked his old self in F1 Mexico GP
item.content:encoded: Ricciardo managed to find a set-up breakthrough after his first regular grand prix weekend back from his five-race injury lay-off and put the AlphaTauri fourth on the grid for the Mexico City event.He backed that up by running in the top five for the first half of the race, with an unfortunately timed red flag leading to him dropping back to seventh at the finish.The AlphaTauri's competitiveness ...Keep reading

item.title: Norris can’t "put a smile on my face” after letting McLaren F1 team down in Mexico
item.content:encoded: Norris says he felt like he let down the hundreds of people in his McLaren team who were relying on him to get the job done.Without a banker lap, Norris had one shot at a time in Q1 in Mexico, but he ran wide and had to abort, leaving him in 17th on the final grid.FEATURE: 10 things we learned from the 2023 Formula 1 Mexico GPThe mishap came just a couple of races after Norris had a fraught ...Keep reading

item.title: Verstappen hails Red Bull's 'sharper' F1 race starts
item.content:encoded: From third on the grid Verstappen enjoyed a mighty launch off the line as he passed both front-row starting Ferrari drivers Charles Leclerc and Carlos Sainz.On the mid-race restart following a red flag, Verstappen again made a swift getaway to secure his lead, which he would build up to 12 seconds over Mercedes' Lewis Hamilton.For the dominant Red Bull squad, which has won all but one of the 19 ...Keep reading

item.title: 2023 F1 Brazilian GP – How to watch, session timings and more
item.content:encoded: Following Max Verstappen’s record 16th F1 grand prix win of the season in Mexico, breaking his own previous record from last year, the paddock heads to Sao Paulo for the final sprint race weekend of 2023. With Verstappen dominant once again, Lewis Hamilton’s second-place finish did cut the gap to Sergio Perez to 20 points in the tussle for the runner-up spot in the drivers’ standings after ...Keep reading

item.title: 10 things we learned at the 2023 F1 Mexico Grand Prix
item.content:encoded: Max Verstappen chalked up his 16th Formula 1 win of 2023 at the Mexico Grand Prix, but his inexorable dominance has ceased to be a surprise.There were, however, a series of other interesting threads that emerged during the weekend at the Autodromo Hermanos Rodriguez, as rumours over the drivers' futures in the Red Bull stable intensified in the aftermath; Sergio Perez's first-corner crash and ...Keep reading

item.title: Vasseur: Hard tyre stint ruined Leclerc’s Mexico F1 race
item.content:encoded: Leclerc had a solid first stint on the medium tyre despite missing a front wing endplate after a first-corner clash with Sergio Perez.He pitted for hards just a couple of laps before Kevin Magnussen’s crash brought out the red flag.During the break Ferrari replaced his damaged front wing but rather than switch to medium tyres for the restarted second half of the race, as some rivals did, the ...Keep reading

item.title: Alonso: Aston is “not fighting for anything” in final F1 races
item.content:encoded: Alonso was third in the World Championship as recently as last month’s Italian GP, but after a run of frustrating weekends, he now lies fifth, with Charles Leclerc, Lando Norris and George Russell all reeling him in.Aston Martin meanwhile has fallen to fifth place in the constructors’ championship but is under no threat from behind after being bettered by McLaren.Alonso had another ...Keep reading

item.title: Overheating brakes triggered heavy Magnussen crash in F1 Mexico GP
item.content:encoded: The Dane was pitched off the road on lap 32 by a suspected left rear track rod failure when the car was under load in the fast right-hander at Turn 8.Magnussen climbed out of the car unaided, but damage to the barriers led to a red flag. He was taken to the medical centre, but he was passed fit and soon returned to the paddock.Brake temperatures are always on the limit in Mexico, and in ...Keep reading

item.content:encoded: But did the race unfold in his favour to ease his path to a record 16th win of the year, aided by Sergio Perez’s Turn 1 zealousness and McLaren’s Lando Norris starting so far down the order?While Lewis Hamilton and Charles Leclerc gave gallant chase it appeared that, once again, nobody could catch Verstappen.To analyse all the action from Sunday's Mexico Grand Prix, Martyn Lee is joined by ...Keep reading

item.title: Ricciardo: F1 Mexico GP was "the weekend I dreamed of"
item.content:encoded: Ricciardo was the star of qualifying by claiming fourth on the grid at the Autodromo Hermanos Rodriguez, narrowly behind the two Ferraris and season dominator Max Verstappen.Although he was unable to stay in the top five due to an ill-timed red flag, Ricciardo clinched a huge result for AlphaTauri in seventh, his first points since his return to the Faenza squad in the second half of this ...Keep reading

item.title: Norris Mexico GP "masterpiece" reminded Stella of Alonso's F1 Valencia 2012 win
item.content:encoded: Norris was forced to start from 17th on the grid after failing to set a competitive lap time in qualifying.But the Briton scythed through the field in Mexico City, and even after losing positions because of an unfortunately timed red flag and a poor restart, he continued reeling off overtakes to finish fifth.His McLaren team was floored by Norris' race day performance, with team boss Stella ...Keep reading

item.title: Horner “can’t blame” Perez for F1 Mexico GP Turn 1 move
item.content:encoded: From fifth on the grid, Perez made a good start and at the first corner he tried to go around the outside of poleman Charles Leclerc and his own team-mate Max Verstappen.The Ferrari hit his rear wheel and pitched him up into the air and into the run-off area.Perez was able to get back to the pits but the team soon determined that the damage was too extensive for him to be able to ...Keep reading

item.title: Norris: Putting F1 rivals in "awkward" spots key to Mexico GP passes
item.content:encoded: The McLaren driver had endured a dismal qualifying in Mexico City after making a mistake on his only run in Q1 and failing to make it through, ending up 17th on the grid.But after trying an alternative strategy early on in the grand prix with the softs, he made good progress to get up to 10th before the mid-race red flag that helped reset any tyre offset against rivals.However, in backing off to ...Keep reading

item.title: Leclerc had "nowhere to go" in Perez F1 Mexico GP clash
item.content:encoded: The Ferrari driver had started from pole but did not make a brilliant getaway, as he found himself under attack from Red Bull duo Max Verstappen and Perez.Verstappen was charging to his right down the inside, while Perez had more momentum as he slipstreamed past on the left and attempted to swoop into the lead as the cars ran three abreast into the first corner.But there was not enough room for ...Keep reading

item.title: Hamilton: "Sweet finesse" key to F1 Mexico GP runner-up charge
item.content:encoded: Following a mid-race red flag caused by Kevin Magnussen crashing his Haas, Hamilton took to the restart from third spot with the medium tyre as Charles Leclerc and Verstappen ahead of him opted for the hards.Although he failed to make the most of the early tyre advantage to leapfrog Leclerc away from the grid, Hamilton eventually managed to get past the Ferrari a few laps later as he then set ...Keep reading

item.title: 2023 F1 Mexico GP results: Verstappen wins after Magnussen shunt
item.content:encoded: Verstappen grabbed the lead from third on the grid after powering past the Ferraris that had locked out the front row. His team-mate Sergio Perez tried to follow him around the outside of the first corner, but bounced off Charles Leclerc’s Ferrari and was forced out of the race.Verstappen was dominating the race before Magnussen suffered a big crash when his Haas’s rear suspension appeared to ...Keep reading

item.title: F1 Mexico GP: Verstappen dominates; Hamilton P2 as Perez suffers lap 1 exit
item.content:encoded: The victory gives Verstappen a new record for most F1 wins in a single season, this his 16th 2023 triumph after he scored 15 last year.At the start, Verstappen shot off the line as the two Ferraris ahead rather stuttered away, the Dutchman carving between Leclerc and Sainz to easily claim the inside line for Turn 1.There, Perez suddenly arrived on the far left of Verstappen and Leclerc, having got ...Keep reading

item.title: Perez "only thinking of winning" in F1 Mexico GP start move
item.content:encoded: Perez made an excellent getaway from fifth on the grid and slipstreamed past the leading Ferrari of Charles Leclerc and his team-mate Max Verstappen on the long drag race to Turn 1.With Leclerc and Verstappen still side by side, Perez made it three-wide on the outside and collided with the Ferrari man as he turned into Turn 1.The incident launched Perez's Red Bull into the air, which damaged the ...Keep reading

item.title: Heavy Magnussen F1 crash causes Mexico GP red flag
item.content:encoded: On Lap 32 of 71 Magnussen was snaking his Haas through the Esses in the second sector when he appeared to suffer a left-rear suspension failure, which sent his car hard into left-hand barriers at Turn 9.The heavy hit destroyed Magnussen's car, but the Dane was able to climb out of his wrecked Haas unaided.After a brief safety car period the race was red-flagged with 36 laps remaining, due to the ...Keep reading

item.title: Gasly told Alpine about AlphaTauri Mexico F1 tricks behind its shock step
item.content:encoded: While Daniel Ricciardo qualified a surprise fourth Gasly is only 11th on Sunday’s grid, while his team-mate Esteban Ocon struggled even more, and couldn’t better 16th in Q1, before gaining a spot from a grid penalty for Yuki Tsunoda.Gasly, who drove for Toro Rosso/AlphaTauri in Mexico City five times between 2017 and 2022 – finishing as high as fourth two years ago – suggested that the ...Keep reading

item.title: Russell: Knife-edge tyres a factor in F1 Mexico GP qualifying woes
item.content:encoded: Russell stressed that getting the tyres to work effectively in the face of changing track temperatures was the biggest challenge faced by all drivers, and he conceded that his team “got it wrong.”Mercedes had a difficult Friday, with Lewis Hamilton finishing FP2 in seventh, and Russell in 10th.Both drivers believed that there was scope for improvement on Saturday, but despite making some ...Keep reading

item.title: F1 needs “immediate action” over pitlane impeding problem, says Stella
item.content:encoded: One of the unintended consequences of the recent introduction of a maximum lap-time for qualifying outlaps is that it has forced drivers to try to build up gaps to the cars ahead of them coming out of the pits. This has triggered times when drivers have impeded rivals from going out, and left competitors frustrated that they are being held up by those ahead of them. In Mexico on Saturday, Max ...Keep reading

item.title: Alfa Romeo targets 2024 Super Formula spot for Pourchaire
item.content:encoded: The Frenchman is well placed to seal the Formula 2 title at the Abu Dhabi finale and, while mathematically he could still lose out on the championship to Mercedes junior Fredrik Vesti, even if he failed to secure the title it would make no sense for him to remain in the category for a fourth full season.Alfa boss Alessandro Alunni Bravi previously placed Stoffel Vandoorne in Japan when he was ...Keep reading

item.title: Stroll to start F1 Mexico GP from pitlane after parc ferme changes
item.content:encoded: Stroll was due to start from 17th in the Mexico City race amid a dreadful weekend for Aston Martin, with team-mate Fernando Alonso only managing 13th on the grid.Given Stroll was already due to start from the rear, Aston Martin has decided to make wholesale car changes in parc ferme, changing various elements to a different specification and tweaking the suspension set-up.That means Stroll will ...Keep reading

item.title: Perez brushes off Ricciardo F1 Mexico GP qualifying performance
item.content:encoded: Perez had one of his best qualifying sessions of recent months relative to team-mate Max Verstappen, finishing Q3 just 0.160s behind the world champion as the pair lined up third and fifth.However the two Red Bulls were split by the AlphaTauri of Ricciardo, who was quick throughout qualifying, taking fourth, fifth and fourth across the three sessions.It was the first time since he returned to the ...Keep reading

item.title: Bottas: Slow turns and thin air at F1 Mexico GP key to Alfa Romeo promise
item.content:encoded: Bottas and team-mate Zhou Guanyu both made Q3 and qualified ninth and 10th, putting them in a strong position to score crucial points in the tight battle amongst the four teams at the bottom of the constructors’ championship.The Finn showed good pace throughout the weekend, earning fourth place in FP2 on Friday, and then sailed through the first two parts of qualifying in fifth and seventh.The ...Keep reading

item.title: FIA originally planned to check only Hamilton and Leclerc planks at F1 US GP
item.content:encoded: Hamilton and Leclerc were excluded from the result of last weekend’s race in Austin after scrutineering checks discovered that their underfloor planks had worn away by more than the 1mm that is allowed in the rulebook. While there was no dispute that both cars were outside of the regulations, the subsequent emergence that the FIA only checked four cars in total prompted some intrigue about ...Keep reading

item.title: How Ricciardo showed first glimpse of Red Bull F1 seat claim
item.content:encoded: After all, his AlphaTauri team currently lies at the bottom of the world championship table, and it had scored just five points all season until Yuki Tsunoda doubled that total with a strong race in Austin, helped by the disqualifications ahead.But really the story in Mexico on Saturday was about Ricciardo himself, and his quest for redemption after being bundled out of McLaren at the end of his ...Keep reading

item.title: Alonso admits he's “not doing a good job” with tricky Aston Martin F1 car
item.content:encoded: Alonso confessed that he is lacking confidence in the AMR23 after uncharacteristically suffering big spins at the high-speed track on both Friday and Saturday.Ultimately, he couldn’t better 13th in qualifying, while his team-mate Lance Stroll was only 18th.“Very tricky,” said the Spaniard when asked by Autosport about what the incidents said about the car. “Yesterday [Friday] at the ...Keep reading

item.title: Verstappen: F1 qualifying traffic rules "all imperfect"
item.content:encoded: Verstappen, George Russell and Fernando Alonso were all summoned to explain their actions in the Mexico City pitlane as the pack massed at the end of Q1. All three escaped sanctions for pitlane impeding around the rules requirement to drive to a maximum laptime (or minimum speed) when not on push laps, which has been in place since the 2023 Italian Grand Prix. They were all cleared here in part ...Keep reading

item.title: F1 Mexico GP future doesn’t depend on "superhero" Perez’s Red Bull fate
item.content:encoded: In wake of Perez joining the F1 grid, the series returned to Mexico City's Autodromo Hermanos Rodriguez following a 12-year hiatus.Perez has always enjoyed patriotic home support, but the Mexican audience's fervour soared to new heights once the Guadalajara native joined Red Bull and became a regular contender for wins in 2021.But amid his struggles alongside dominant team-mate Max Verstappen, the ...Keep reading

item.title: F1 Mexico Grand Prix – Start time, starting grid, how to watch, & more
item.content:encoded: Ferrari secured a shock front row lockout with Leclerc and Carlos Sainz at the Autodromo Hermanos Rodriguez as Max Verstappen, who had topped all three practice sessions, ended the decisive Q3 session third fastest for Red Bull.The final classification was subject to a number of post-qualifying investigations, with Verstappen and George Russell plus his Mercedes team-mate Lewis Hamilton among ...Keep reading

item.title: Verstappen, Hamilton escape sanctions for Mexico F1 qualifying incidents
item.content:encoded: Ahead of the final runs in Q1, Verstappen, Alonso and Russell all backed up other cars while leaving the pitlane in a bid to create a gap and find clear air.All three drivers were summoned by the FIA's stewards for "unnecessarily impeding" at pit exit, but they decided not to take any further action.The drivers and their team managers successfully argued that their actions were the result of the ...Keep reading

item.title: Ricciardo feels “a lot like my old self” after shock P4 in Mexico F1 qualifying
item.content:encoded: In only his second weekend back from a hand injury that ruled him out of five grands prix rounds, Ricciardo had already showed good pace on Friday when he was sixth in FP2.He slipped back to ninth in Saturday’s FP3 session, however in qualifying Ricciardo was on form as he took fourth in Q1 and fifth in Q2.On both occasions he was helped by team-mate Yuki Tsunoda, who was able to focus on towing ...Keep reading

item.title: Albon "more frustrated" by Williams Mexico F1 pace than deleted Q2 lap
item.content:encoded: Albon showed huge promise in free practice for the race in Mexico City after finishing FP3 less than a tenth behind pacesetter Max Verstappen.But Albon and team-mate Logan Sargeant both struggled in qualifying after experiencing a shift in their car's handling, with Albon even suggesting the car had developed an issue.The Anglo-Thai still managed to salvage a Q3 spot in ninth but was demoted to a ...Keep reading

item.title: Norris: F1 Mexico Grand Prix Q1 exit “on me” despite McLaren pit call
item.content:encoded: The McLaren driver had looked to be a strong contender to challenge for pole position in Mexico City, after showing some impressive form in Friday practice.But it all went wrong at the start of qualifying when his first banker run on medium tyres was aborted following an instruction from the pitwall.That left him with everything to do on his final effort, when there would be no margin for error ...Keep reading
